typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fccat
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		SouthridgeMovieID as string,
		actors as string,
		title as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		runtime as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		availabilityDate as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> southrcat
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> vacat
southrcat derive(ActorID = toInteger(title),
		ActorName = toInteger(title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		SourceSystemMovieID,
		SouthridgeMovieID,
		ActorID,
		ActorName,
		actors,
		title,
		genre,
		rating,
		runtime,
		releaseYear,
		availabilityDate,
		streamingAvailabilityDate
	)) ~> Select1
fccat sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['fccatalog.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> catalogfc
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['catalogsr.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> southcatfin
vacat sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['catalogva.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> vafinalcat
